name: Mind Strategics Learning
what_you_do: The Chalifour Consulting Group focuses on strategic implementation and growth, working alongside clients to put changes into action across finance, operations, people, and marketing.
social_proof: The Chalifour Consulting Group has helped over 100 companies achieve more than $7 billion in sales each year, making them one of the most influential business coaches in the world.
business_focus: The Chalifour Consulting Group is a hands-on business coaching firm that bridges the gap between advice and action.
service_provided: business consulting, strategic implementation, growth, finance, operations, marketing
